metadata.title: Sterling Forever Hoop Earrings – Modern Women’s Fashion Jewelry - Colorful Women's Earrings – Ideal Birthday or Holiday Gift
features: CLASSIC HOOP EARRINGS: Available in a range of sizes, Sterling Forever's Sterling Silver Hoop Earrings are suitable for any occasion, and add a little timeless bling to any look.
SECURE CLASP: These elegant women’s hoops are held securely in place with a strong friction hinged clasp backing. The lightweight earrings are comfortable enough to wear all day, and into the night!

AN AESTHETIC GIFT: You can’t go wrong with surprising the woman or teenager in your life with hoop earrings – they are an essential for every modern jewelry box. Perfect for birthdays and anniversaries.

JEWELRY POUCH: This modern pair of earrings is supplied with a jewelry pouch for safe keeping. To keep your Sterling Forever jewelry in perfect condition, do not wear it while in contact with water or harsh chemicals.
STERLING FOREVER: If anything were to happen to your jewelry while in use, Sterling Forever carries a brand-wide Lifetime Guarantee Policy, which will repair or replace the item free of charge.
description: STERLING FOREVER – GOLD PLATED, ROSEGOLD PLATED OR STERLING SILVER HOOP EARRINGSNeed a pair of hoops you can wear anywhere? These sturdy sterling silver hoop earrings are ideal for any occasion, whether it's a casual outing or a glamorous night out with your girls. Made from 14K gold plated, rose gold plated or solid sterling silver, the hoops are available in a range of sizes from mini through to large, so there is a pair to suit every woman or teenager’s style.Comfortable and lightweight. The designer inspired earrings are both lead and nickel free.A great birthday or anniversary gift idea for any women or teens, hoop earrings never go out of style and transition effortlessly from daytime to night-time wear. Surprise your wife, girlfriend or soulmate with a pair of hoop earrings that she will wear endlessly.Every pair of Sterling Forever Hoop Earrings is supplied in a jewelry pouch to keep your new favorite piece safe and protected when you’re not wearing it. To keep your hoops in perfect condition, do not wear them while in contact with water or harsh chemicals.Discover a mix of easy-to-wear pieces inspired by fashion runway trends, celebrity favorites and coveted high end looks. From fashion earrings to elegant bracelets and delicate necklaces, our high quality jewelry is designed at our studio in Maryland and made to last forever.
metadata.details: {"Package Dimensions": "6 x 4 x 4 inches; 8 Ounces", "Department": "Womens", "Date First Available": "December 2, 2021", "Manufacturer": "Sterling Forever"}
